byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

abstract: Hulu's owners said that each of them found value in holding on to the Web video company instead of selling it to any of a number of potential bidders.
snippet: Hulu's owners said that each of them found value in holding on to the Web video company instead of selling it to any of a number of potential bidders.

headline.main: Hulu's Owners Call Off Plans to Sell Company
headline.print_headline: Consortium Behind Hulu Cancels Plans to Sell the Online Video Hub
